alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 3:34AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Newton and northeastern Jasper Counties through 400 AM CST... At 334 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jasper, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Burkeville, Jamestown, Farrsville, Harrisburg, Mayflower and Wiergate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
